statements: SELECT * FROM daily_reports
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM daily_reports WHERE transaction_volume > 1000
SELECT * FROM daily_reports WHERE revenue >= 500.50 ORDER BY transaction_volume DESC
SELECT transaction_volume, revenue FROM daily_reports WHERE transaction_volume < 500 ORDER BY revenue ASC
SELECT report_id, revenue, transaction_volume FROM daily_reports WHERE revenue < 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM daily_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM daily_reports WHERE transaction_volume > 1000
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daily_reports
SELECT * FROM daily_reports WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY transaction_volume ASC
SELECT report_id, transaction_volume, revenue FROM daily_reports ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM daily_transaction_volumes
SELECT date, transactions FROM daily_transaction_volumes ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, transactions FROM daily_transaction_volumes WHERE transactions > 1000
SELECT SUM(transactions) AS total_transactions FROM daily_transaction_volumes
SELECT date, revenue FROM daily_revenue WHERE revenue < 500.00 ORDER BY revenue
SELECT * FROM daily_transaction_volumes ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, transactions FROM daily_transaction_volumes WHERE transactions > 100 ORDER BY transactions DESC
SELECT * FROM daily_revenue WHERE revenue < 5000 ORDER BY date
SELECT date, transactions, revenue FROM daily_transaction_volumes JOIN daily_revenue ON daily_transaction_volumes.date = daily_revenue.date ORDER BY transactions DESC
SELECT date, SUM(transactions) AS total_transactions FROM daily_transaction_volumes GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT * FROM daily_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM daily_transactions WHERE transaction_volume > 1000;
SELECT report_date, total_revenue FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_volume FROM daily_transactions WHERE transaction_volume < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT revenue_id, revenue_amount FROM daily_revenue WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM daily_transactions WHERE transaction_volume > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_volume FROM daily_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_id

SELECT dt.transaction_id, dt.transaction_date, dr.revenue_amount FROM daily_transactions dt JOIN daily_revenue dr ON dt.transaction_id = dr.transaction_id WHERE dr.revenue_amount > 500 ORDER BY dt.transaction_id ASC
SELECT report_date, transaction_count, total_revenue FROM reports WHERE total_revenue < 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC

SELECT SUM(transaction_volume) AS total_volume, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM daily_transactions dt JOIN daily_revenue dr ON dt.transaction_id = dr.transaction_id JOIN reports r ON r.report_id = dr.revenue_id WHERE dt.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND r.report_date <= '2022-05-31'
SELECT * FROM daily_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_volume, revenue FROM daily_transactions WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM summary_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM revenue_details GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT log_message FROM transaction_log WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM daily_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, revenue FROM daily_transactions WHERE transaction_volume > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM revenue_details ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, log_message, log_date FROM transaction_log WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_transactions, total_revenue FROM summary_reports WHERE total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM daily_transaction_volumes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_name, transaction_count FROM daily_transaction_volumes JOIN users ON daily_transaction_volumes.transaction_count = users.user_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT MAX(revenue), MIN(revenue) FROM daily_revenue;
SELECT user_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY user_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM daily_transaction_volumes ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, amount, product_name FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN products ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM daily_revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY date;
SELECT user_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 100 GROUP BY user_name HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
